EmailTemplate.description: Email Template used when forwarding a Quote to CSSC.
EmailTemplate.name: Forward AttachedQuote
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote Attached ({!Case.Subject})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Please process the attached Quote.
Plant: Ship To: YO:
For questions please contact {!Case.OwnerFullName} and reference case number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Thanks!
